venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
I checked the schedule for Tuesday and Untracable is no longer playing!
SO The choices can be as follows:

7:00 Vantage Point (Drama)
7:05 Fools Gold (Action/Adventure)
7:30 Definitely Maybe (Romance) Looks funny
7:40 Jumper (Action/Adventure)

Please e-mail me with the movie you'd rather see ASAP So I can let everyone know the time to meet and what movie we'll be seeing.
I'll let everyone know Monday night.
Meet up time will be 15 min. before the movie start time listed.
I'll still be at the front entrance near the piano wearing a green coat.
item.how_to_find_us: This time I'll be in the front entrance near the piano. I'll be wearing a green coat.
item.name: Movie Night! New movie
